idea:
We as KMech Engineers is professionally managed company.


Myself Abhijeet Lokhande having 14+ years of experience in Sales & Marketing of Manual & Actuated Valves for below industries;


• Oil & Gas (Onshore & Offshore)


• Petrochemicals


• Fertilizers


• Power


• Specialty Chemicals


We have two Business Operations as


1. Representation of Indian as well as Overseas Manufacturers


2. Trading (Domestic & Exports) of Manual Valves, Control Valves, Actuated Valves, Valve Spares, Accessories, Pipes & Pipe Components



Representation Business


We as KMech Engineers represent below Organizations;


1. Sulzer Pumps India Pvt Ltd, India


2. Advanced Actuators Ltd, UK


3. Enertork Ltd, S. Korea


4. VALV Technologies, USA


5. ValveMatics Engg, India


Trading Business (Domestic & Exports)


We as KMech Engineers do Trading of Mechanical & Instrumentation Products like


1. Pumps


2. Mechanical Valves


3. Instrumentation Valves (Control Valves & Shutdown Valves)


4. Pipes


5. Flanges & Pipe Fittings


6. Instruments (Pressure, Level, Flow)
name: KMech Engineers

idea:
We are a Start-up dealing in Home/Corporate Services professionally such as;

1. Cleaning Services

2.Manpower Services

3.Laundry Services

4.Food and Dietery Services


We are building the next generation platform for household/corporate services. We are aiming to become the India’s premier marketplace connecting professionals with customers seeking household services. Our first entry vertical is cleaning, where we are offering customers a super simple and convenient way to book a trusted cleaner online/offline.

Most people find cleaning their homes/offices to be stressful and even painful. By starting a cleaning business, we are tapping into an enormous market with plenty of clientele. There will always be a demand for cleaning services, which keeps you in business and keeps every client’s home spotless.

In our Manpower segment often referred to as a “temp service," the company’s primary business is providing a bridge between qualified workers and the businesses that require its services. We create a co-employment relationship that affords workers the flexibility to explore different environments and schedules while enjoying predictable pay and benefit plans.

Business owners and managers hire staffing firms to help them find temporary, long-term and temporary-to-permanent employees and contractors to work at their companies and organizations. We help companies in diverse industries, including education, health care and marketing.

The definition of manpower is the strength or force of a human, or the combined strength of a group of people. An example of manpower is the muscle power of five men on a work crew. The total number of all available workers, the workforce. The power exerted by a single person (analogous to horsepower.)

With our outstanding range of services, we have been able to make a reputation in the placement sector. We dedicate ourselves in recruiting highly qualified and experienced professionals for companies.

The company aims to provide the food and dietary services in various govt. sectors such as Schools, Hospitals, and Railways etc.

We aim to make the nation healthy. To sustain it we provide the healthy food and dietary services to the students, patients and travellers.

Research shows that students who participate in the school meal programs consume more whole grains, milk, fruits, and vegetables during meal times and have better overall diet quality, than nonparticipants. And, eating breakfast at school is associated with better attendance rates, fewer missed school days, and better test scores. Meals served through these programs must meet specific nutrition requirements.

Schools can encourage students to participate in the school meal programs by:

• Providing meals that are nutritious and appealing.

• Obtaining input from students and parents about items they would like to see served in the meals.

• Ensuring that students have adequate time to eat their meal (at least 10 minutes for breakfast and 20 minutes for lunch).

• Preventing the overt identification of students who are eligible to receive free or reduced-price meals.

We are a leading laundry service providing company that offers excellent clothing, pressing and cleaning services to both household and corporate clients respectively. Laundry with us is a time saving, convenient and affordable undertaking. We comprehend the busy schedule of our particular clients extremely well. Considering this, we offer our clients a great facility of free pick-up and delivery services. This approach agrees our clients to profit our services without much of a stretch.
name: SHIVMAY MULTIPURPOSE SRVICES LLP

idea: PraShivYog is a health and wellness company based in Juhu,Mumbai with a mission to educate, empower and elevate physical, mental,emotional and spiritual health of every individual who is truly seeking natural holistic, preventive, non invasive healthcare . As the original integrative health experts, we blend modern well-being practices with Ayurveda - a centuries-old system of health and healing - to offer a whole-self approach. By focusing on physical, mental, and spiritual health, we empower people to create self-care routines as unique as they are, unlocking their body’s natural healing abilities.
name: PRASHIVYOG LLP

idea: Sajhi Mitti helps marginalised farmers transition to Regenerative Farming so that they grow healthy nutritious chemical free produce while sequestering carbon to protect Earth's climate. Sajhi Mitti helps consumer families access this pure food so that they gain good health and the livelihood of the farmers improves.
name: Sajhi Mitti

idea: AAPLI BIRYANI RESTAURANTS LLP  serve you our speciality biryanis or other luscious cusines catering to your needs to the best of our capabilities. Right from our Grilled chicken, Bheja masala, Gurda fry from hydrabadi specialties to our Chinese noodles, crispy corn chilli pepper, paneer 65 and crispy vegetable manchurian, you will be stunned by our amazing delicacies. Embellished with flavours so fascinating, that everything else comes to a standstill. Its artfully balanced exotic spices, golden-hued basmati along with a potpourri of elegant ingredients will lift your day in the most majestic way. By using the finest quality spices, we transform the freshest of ingredients into truly unforgettable dishes. We only use spices that we have carefully selected ourselves, which are then freshly ground in our production unit, to ensure that each teaspoon has maximum flavour.we serve an extensive amount of exciting vegetarian dishes that are full of flavour.
name: AAPLI BIRYANI RESTAURANTS LLP
